description: Warn before executing dangerous rm commands (rm -rf /„ÄÅrm -rf ~/ etc.)

hooks.command: python3 -c "import sys,json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); cmd=data.get('input',{}).get('command',''); patterns=['rm -rf /','rm -rf ~','rm -rf $HOME']; result={'decision':'block','reason':'Dangerous rm command detected: '+cmd} if any(p in cmd for p in patterns) else {}; print(json.dumps(result))"
